sentences: Ben Prunty is an American composer, best known for his work on the 2012 video game, FTL: Faster Than Light.
Prunty grew up in Scarborough, Maine, but now lives in the San Francisco Bay Area.
He attended the New England School of Communications for audio engineering and picked up some skills he would put to use later.
Prunty's first notable work was the soundtrack for the 2012 real-time strategy indie game
